meanings.definition: The quality of being able to be foreseen or anticipated.
meanings.sent1: The foreseeability of the storm allowed us to prepare in advance.
meanings.sent2: The lawyer argued that the foreseeability of the accident should have been obvious.
meanings.sent3: The foreseeability of the surprise party was ruined when the birthday girl found out.
meanings.sent4: The foreseeability of success in the project made everyone optimistic.
meanings.sent5: The foreseeability of the sunrise brought a sense of comfort to the weary travelers.

meanings.sent1: The foreseeability of the outcome made the decision easier.
meanings.sent2: The foreseeability of the trend was evident to all the analysts.
meanings.sent3: The foreseeability of the plot twist in the movie made it less exciting.
meanings.sent4: The foreseeability of the solution to the puzzle surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The foreseeability of the traffic jam caused frustration among commuters.
